name: hcsvistaremote
description: Remote Control for HCS's JANDS vista instances

scripts.build-frontend: cd src_frontend/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-backend: cd src_backend/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build-all: npm run build-frontend && npm run build-backend
scripts.bin-win: cd src_backend && npm run build-bin && cd ../
scripts.build-binary-win: npm run build-all && npm run move-built-frontend && npm run bin-win
scripts.install-all: cd src_backend && npm i && cd ../src_frontend && npm i && cd ../

author: Soren Zaiser
